senses.de: Based on or influenced by personal feelings, tastes, or opinions.
senses.ex: Art is often a matter of individual, subjective interpretation.

Tips.title: Context Sensitivity
Tips.description: The meaning of 'subjective' shifts depending on the topic being discussed.
Tips.example: Your enjoyment of a movie is subjective and may differ from others.

Tips.title: Avoid As Fact
Tips.description: Use 'subjective' to express personal views, not universal truths.
Tips.example: 'Pizza is the best food' is a subjective statement.

Tips.title: Debate Cautiously
Tips.description: Subjective opinions can lead to debates as others may have different views.
Tips.example: Her subjective preference for winter sparked a lively conversation.

senses.de: Existing in the mind; belonging to the thinking subject rather than to the object of thought.
senses.ex: People's dreams are quite subjective and can be influenced by a variety of factors.

Tips.title: Mental Processes
Tips.description: 'Subjective' often describes thoughts unique to an individual's mind.
Tips.example: Fear is subjective, varying from person to person.

Tips.title: Emotional Influence
Tips.description: 'Subjective' can highlight the impact emotions have on perception.
Tips.example: Their breakup caused her subjective view of relationships.

senses.de: Relating to the subject or actor of a sentence and not the object.
senses.ex: In the sentence 'I love you', 'I' is in the subjective case.

Tips.title: Grammatical Role
Tips.description: 'Subjective' specifies a grammatical subject's form in certain languages.
Tips.example: In 'He reads a book,' 'He' is subjective, referring to the doer.

Tips.title: Subject Focus
Tips.description: When discussing grammar, 'subjective' stresses the subject's action or state.
Tips.example: In 'She was happy,' 'She' is in the subjective case.

Bias.wordDefinition:
Bias refers to a preference or prejudice that can negatively impact one's judgment or decision-making because they are not based on facts, evidence or fair analysis.

For example, if someone has a strong bias against a political party, they might not consider any of that party's policies or actions fairly, regardless of their merit.

It's important to be aware of one's biases and to strive for objectivity whenever possible.

Opinionated.wordDefinition:
Opinionated means having a strong opinion and not willing to consider other people's opinions. It is applicable to a person who strongly believes in something and is not open to hearing another person's point of view.

Opinionated describes a person who has strong opinions, while subjective describes the expression of personal opinions or experiences.

Partial.wordDefinition:
Partial means showing favoritism or being biased towards one side. Subjective means based on personal opinions or feelings rather than facts or evidence.

For example, if a sports fan presents an opinion that their favorite team is the best, it may be considered partial because they have a biased view.

Partial applies to situations or opinions that are biased, while subjective applies to opinions that are based on personal feelings rather than on factual information.

Partisan.wordDefinition:
Partisan refers to a strong supporter of a particular group or cause, often affiliated with a political party.

Partisan indicates a strong allegiance to a particular group or cause that may lead to bias or close-mindedness, while subjective simply implies an individual's personal perspective on a matter.

Personal.wordDefinition:
Personal describes something that relates to an individual's thoughts, feelings, and experiences. For example, "My personal favorite food is pizza.".

Subjective means something that is based on one's personal opinions or feelings, rather than on facts. For example, "The movie was good, but that's a subjective opinion.".

Personal refers to something individual while subjective means something based on personal opinions.

Prejudice.wordDefinition:
Prejudice is having a preconceived opinion that is not based on reason or actual experience.

Prejudice can lead to unfair treatment and discrimination towards others.

Prejudice is a negative attitude towards a particular group or belief based on preconceived notions without much foundation, while subjective is based on one's personal opinions or experiences, which may or may not be biased.

quotes.Text: Our science fails to recognize those special properties of life that make it fundamental to material reality. This view of the world - biocentrism - revolves around the way a subjective experience, which we call consciousness, relates to a physical process. It is a vast mystery and one that I have pursued my entire life.
quotes.Title: American Scientist
quotes.Name: Robert Lanza

quotes.Text: Dream study impacts culture. We are put in touch with the inner poet who dreams. We hear our inner, subjective response to the outer world. That helps spiritualize our lives.
quotes.Name: Henry Reed

quotes.Text: In my reviews, I feel it's good to make it clear that I'm not proposing objective truth, but subjective reactions; a review should reflect the immediate experience.
quotes.Title: American Critic
quotes.Name: Roger Ebert

quotes.Text: The poet sees better than other mortals. I do not see things as they are, but according to my own subjective impression, and this makes life easier and simpler.
quotes.Title: German Composer
quotes.Name: Robert Schumann

quotes.Text: When they talk of ghosts of the dead who wander in the night with things still undone in life, they approximate my subjective experience of this life.
quotes.Title: American Author
quotes.Name: Jack Henry Abbott

quotes.Text: I won't touch on risky, because that's subjective. People are just afraid of things too much. Afraid of things that don't necessarily merit fear.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Frank Ocean

quotes.Text: Mythology is a subjective truth. Every culture imagines life a certain way.
quotes.Title: Indian Author
quotes.Name: Devdutt Pattanaik

quotes.Text: Reviews are extremely subjective, but I have respect for them.
quotes.Title: Indian Actress
quotes.Name: Parvathy

quotes.Text: I know gymnastics. It's always been a subjective appreciation.
quotes.Title: Romanian Coach
quotes.Name: Bela Karolyi

quotes.Text: Art is subjective. I'm not looking for people's praise.
quotes.Title: British Model
quotes.Name: Tali Lennox
